name: Trendika
overview:
Trendika is place where people share opinions.

Headquartered in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, Trendika, LLC is an Internet company that focuses on collecting the entered and shared opinions of users and sharing these opinions openly via the Internet. By enabling users to freely share opinions and commentary on numerous aspects of businesses, brands, current events, Trendika serves as an opinion database. The main product of Trendika, www.trendika.com, is the primary means to collect user opinions. Through the Mobile Opinions system, users scan QR codes to write on-location reviews of restaurants. Organized by geographic region, Trendika.com is frequently updated to provide the most current depiction of trends. Items to be voted upon or polled are displayed through a framework of lists that users interact with. The first version of Trendika displays the business establishments and local interests of the Main Line suburbs of Philadephia and its environs followed by a site dedicated to Ocean City, NJ
